Nemesis Enforcer/Oblitercons/Stinkbomb/Ramhorn:

::Scavenger went flying through the air, slamming into the ground from Iron 
Raptor's charges::

::Nemesis Enforcer sighed, throwing his energon blade at Iron Raptor's chest, 
blade first::  "If they don't pass, more work for me."  ::Then he yelled, 
feeling the sting of Ramhorn's shots::

::Hiss fired off a few shots from his fusion cannon at Ramhorn from above::

::Pyro fired off a few flame balls at Tigerhawk::

::Breakdown coughed, firing off a grenade at Iron Raptor::

::Dark One screamed, firing off a volley of explosive shells at Liono::

-------

::Stinkbomb got up on the ledge:: "Hmmm..." (he noticed Iron Raptor damaged) 
::Firing off a few dozen sonic shells, he saw Nemesis hit the ground::

::Ramhorn fired off a few pot shots from below at Zardus from below, a low 
chance of the shots hitting::

-----

::Injector and Manterror saw the small battle on the ledge from high above::

"Perfect..." 
::Injector opened a comlink to Hell Beast::
<Hell Beast, this is Injector.  The Alliance is attacking the Maximals, now 
is a perfect oppertunity to exterminate both of them!  Manterror and I will 
engage them, send help>
::Injector fired off three stinger missiles at Hiss::

::Manterror opened fire with four ion disks at Liono::
